your_quote_collection_desc: Quotes you created or quoted are saved here
server_quote_collection_desc: View quotes created in this server
no_server_quotes_yet: This server has no quotes yet
server_galleries_desc: View Quote galleries from servers you're in
standard_plan_required_desc: To use the gallery feature, you need to subscribe to the Standard plan.
insufficient_badge_desc: This server doesn't have enough badges to access the gallery.
insufficient_badge_action: Subscribe to Make it a Quote+ to grant badges to the server!
no_permission_desc: You don't have permission to access this server's gallery.
delete_quote_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this quote?
delete_quote_failed: Failed to delete. Please try again.
delete_quote_no_permission:
You don't have permission to delete this quote.
Only the following can delete:
- Quote creator
- Person who quoted
- Server administrator
